General.Name: LDR Turizm AS
General.Description: LDR Turizm A.S. provides long term car rental services. The company sells used cars; and offers professional and roadside assistance, backup vehicles, maintenance and repair, examination, tire and penalty management, valet, and insurance services. LDR Turizm A.S. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
